issue.title: Splitwise Clone - Expense Sharing App
issue.body:
## Overview
Build a modern expense-sharing web app where friends can track shared expenses and settle debts.

## Features

### Authentication
- Google OAuth sign-in
- Email/password registration and login

### Groups
- Create expense groups (roommates, trips, events)
- Invite members by email
- Dashboard with all groups and balance summaries

### Expenses
- Add expenses with description, amount, payer
- Split equally among group members
- View expense history

### Balances
- Real-time balance calculations
- Simplified debt algorithm (minimize transactions)
- Settle up functionality

### Real-time Updates
- Live updates when expenses change
- No page refresh needed

## Tech Stack

### Setup (use npm for latest versions)
```bash
npx create-next-app@latest --typescript --tailwind --eslint --app
npx shadcn@latest init
npm install better-sqlite3 @types/better-sqlite3
npm install next-auth
npm install lucide-react
npm install socket.io socket.io-client
```

### Stack
- Next.js 14 App Router
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- Lucide React icons
- SQLite with better-sqlite3
- NextAuth.js (Google + Credentials)
- Socket.io for real-time

## Design
- Clean, minimal - not generic AI look
- Distinctive color palette (avoid purple gradients)
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Smooth micro-animations
- Use shadcn/ui components: Card, Button, Input, Avatar, Dialog, Toast

## Pages
- `/` - Landing
- `/login` - Auth (Google + email/password)
- `/dashboard` - Groups overview
- `/groups/[id]` - Group detail
- `/groups/new` - Create group

ems.task: Initialize Next.js project with TypeScript, configure Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui, set up package.json with all dependencies (better-sqlite3, next-auth, socket.io, lucide-react), create tsconfig.json, .gitignore, and environment configuration files

analysisSummary: Build a modern expense-sharing web app with Google/email auth, group management, expense tracking, real-time balance calculations using simplified debt algorithm, and live Socket.io updates. Tech stack: Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind + shadcn/ui, SQLite, NextAuth.js.

pendingEMs.task: Implement authentication system with NextAuth.js (Google OAuth + email/password credentials), create database schema and SQLite setup with better-sqlite3 (users, groups, members, expenses, balances tables), build API routes for data persistence

Build all UI pages and components: landing page, login/auth forms, dashboard with groups overview, group detail view with expense history, create group modal, integrate shadcn/ui components (Card, Button, Input, Avatar, Dialog, Toast)

Implement expense management logic (add expense, split equally among members), build simplified debt algorithm to minimize transactions, create settle up functionality, integrate Socket.io for real-time updates across all clients
